articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Contributors to Successful ICBM Test-fire
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Contributors to Successful ICBM Test-fire
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un had a photo session with those who contributed to the successful test-fire of inter-continental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14.
					 As he arrived at the venue of photo session, the participants enthusiastically welcomed him.
					
					 He again highly appreciated the heroic feats of the scientists, technicians, workers and officials in the field of national defence industry who displayed the independent dignity of Juche Korea and the indomitable spirit of its strong people and devotedly safeguarded the absolute authority of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 He expressed the hope and conviction that those in the field of national defence science would develop and round off the strongest strategic weapons, Juche weapons, in larger quantity more quickly on a higher level and thus fulfill their honorable duty as standard-bearers and pace-setters who take the lead in carrying out the Party's strategic plan for building a nuclear power. He then had a photo session with them.
					
					 Present there were Ri Man Gon and Ri Pyong Chol.

articles.title: Commendations Awarded to Contributors to ICBM Test-launch in Presence of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Commendations Awarded to Contributors to ICBM Test-launch in Presence of Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Party and state commendations were awarded to those who made contributions to the successful test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14 with due ceremony at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un attended the ceremony.
					
					 All the participants in the conferment ceremony broke into rousing cheers of "hurrah".
					
					 He warmly waved back to the enthusiastic cheers of those in the field of national defence science who made admirable success in the cause of the Party for building the Juche-based nuclear force.
					
					 He made a congratulatory speech.
					
					 He said that this significant occasion was provided to highly appreciate the feats of the scientists, technicians, workers and officials in the defence industry who completed the strategic weapon system without fail as intended by the Party in the time fixed by it.
					
					 After analyzing the historic significance of the great success of the ICBM test-launch which has fundamentally changed the strategic position of the DPRK and the world political structure, he said that this proved the validity of the Party's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts.
					
					 He set forth the tasks facing the rocket research and development group.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the scientists, technicians, workers and officials in the field of defence industry would register more shining successes in the sacred struggle to provide the strongest military guarantee under the uplifted slogan "Forward in the do-or-die battle for the country and people!"
					
					 He personally conferred on the contributors to the successful ICBM test-launch Order of Kim Il Sung and Order of Kim Jong Il, the highest orders of the DPRK, the Title of DPRK Hero and Gold Star Medal and Order of National Flag First Class, the Title of DPRK Labor Hero and Gold Medal (Hammer and Sickle) and Order of National Flag First Class, the highest honor of DPRK citizens, Kim Jong Il Prize, watches bearing the august names of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, citation of Chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Jong Un, citation of Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un and Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Brands U.S. as Hotbed of Human Trafficking
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Brands U.S. as Hotbed of Human Trafficking
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry Thursday gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA as regards the fact that the U.S. is being driven to a tight corner for trying to admonish other countries, posing itself as a "human rights judge":
					 The whole world knows that the U.S. is the kingpin of human rights violation and the hotbed of human trafficking.
					
					 In the U.S., over 67,000 women are being subjected to sexual assaults every day, 100,000 children are forced into prostitution every year and child trafficking is on the explosive increase. These facts that reveal the terrible human rights situation of the U.S are merely a tip of an iceberg.
					
					 The U.S. is the only country that refuses to accede to the international conventions on prohibition of human trafficking such as the Convention for the Suppression of the Traffic in Persons and of the Exploitation of the Prostitution of Others and the Convention on the Rights of the Child, to which almost all countries of the world are state parties.
					
					 Recently, two thematic special rapporteurs of the UN Human Rights Council raised questions about the process of the trial of a person with mental disabilities in the U.S. and called for the withdrawal of death sentence passed on the person. This is another expression of international criticism and indignation at the judicial system of the U.S. that fosters human rights violations.
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. continues to fabricate what they call "Trafficking in Persons Report" every year to admonish other countries. This is the height of imprudence and shamelessness.
					
					 The U.S. Department of State recently published the "2017 Trafficking in Persons Report" in which it took issue with human rights situations of other countries. Many countries were so enraged that they unanimously rejected all the findings of the report, terming it a fraudulent document full of absurd fabrications, and condemned the U.S. as the main base of human trafficking.
					
					 In particular, Russia flatly rejected the U.S. "report" as a groundless lie which spelled out such nonsense that the Korean workers at "labor camps" in Russian territory were undergoing "forced labor". It proves once again that the U.S. is the kingpin of fabrications and falsehood.
					
					 The U.S. should stop being presumptuous and quit acting like a "human rights judge" at once. It had better try and find ways to clean its own filthy home, the world's worst wilderness, biggest abuser and the most vicious state criminal of human rights.

articles.title: S. Koreans' Struggle against U.S. Supported
articles.content:
S. Koreans' Struggle against U.S. Supported
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- A spokesman of the Nationwide Special Committee for Probing the Truth behind the GIs' Crimes issued a statement Thursday as regards the anti-U.S. struggle mounting among south Koreans of all social standings with the lapse of 51 years since the fabrication of south Korea-U.S. "Status of Forces Agreement" (SOFA).
					 The unrelenting anti-U.S. struggle waged by civic organizations and people from all walks of life in south Korea is an eruption of the pent-up wrath and grudge of the south Koreans against the U.S. imperialist aggressors who have committed murder, plunder and all other sorts of crimes in south Korea for the past more than five decades under the plea of the SOFA, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 It is shame on the nation that there exists such traitorous agreement as SOFA which makes foreign aggression forces an inviolable being in the present era of independence.
					
					 Today when pro-U.S. traitor Park Geun Hye faced ruin by the people, it has become an urgent demand of south Koreans that brooks no further delay to scrap the shackling agreement.
					
					 But the present south Korean authorities scheme to keep the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in south Korea on a permanent basis while touting "tightened alliance" just as the past "governments".
					
					 They should be mindful that they will face the same miserable fate as traitor Park, a top-class servant for the U.S., if they go reckless to find a way-out in sycophancy toward the U.S. and confrontation with the fellow countrymen while serving the U.S. imperialist aggression forces, the chieftain of national division and root cause of all misfortune and pain, as their savior.

articles.title: Mexican Party Delegation Visits Mangyongdae, Different Places
articles.content:
Mexican Party Delegation Visits Mangyongdae, Different Places
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Mexico led by Ricardo Cantu Garza, coordinator of its National Coordinating Committee, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary career of the President at his old home in Mangyongdae, they went round the historic relics.
					
					 The delegation also toured Kim Il Sung University, Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, Pyongyang Baby Home, Pyongyang Orphanage and others.

articles.title: Defence Scientists Warmly Seen Off
articles.content:
Defence Scientists Warmly Seen Off
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Those who made contributions to the successful test-launch of intercontinental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14 left here Thursday after taking part in the events where they were invited to Pyongyang.
					 At the April 25 Hotel senior officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea saw off scientists, technicians, workers and officials in the field of defence science. 
					
					 When buses carrying the contributors were passing streets, citizens warmly saw off them, waving flags of the DPRK, red flags and bouquets along routes from University Street, the Okryu Bridge, Mansudae Street to the plaza of the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium.

articles.title: Malaria Day Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
Malaria Day Marked in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- An event took place here on Thursday on Malaria Day.
					 Attending it were officials of the Ministry of Public Health, public organizations and media, officials concerned and staff members of missions of international organizations here including the acting representatives of WHO and UNICEF and foreign embassy officials here.
					
					 The speakers said that the WHO set forth "Let us put an end to Malaria" as theme and, therefore, an occasion was provided to contribute to promoting the health of mankind.
					
					 They called upon all the people to know well the hygienic knowledge on Malaria and take an active part in the work for preventing and treating Malaria.
					
					 Then followed a briefing on the activities for preventing Malaria in the DPRK and the orientation of combating it this year.
					
					 After watching a video dealing with the work for preventing Malaria, the participants enjoyed a performance given by a schoolchildren's hygienic information group.
					
					 Meanwhile, information service to prevent Malaria took place at hygienic information houses and preventive and curative medical organs of different levels on the same day.

articles.title: 2nd Taedonggang Beer Fest to Be Held
articles.content:
2nd Taedonggang Beer Fest to Be Held
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The 2nd Pyongyang Taedonggang Beer Fest is to be held at the restaurant boat Taedonggang and the wharf here from July 26 to late August.

articles.title: Tanchon Power Station under Construction in DPRK
articles.content:
Tanchon Power Station under Construction in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The construction of the Tanchon Power Station, the largest counter flow change power station in the DPRK, progresses apace.
					 Its construction is a grand nature-remaking project that requires the tunneling of a hundreds kilometers-long waterway through mountain ranges in the northern part of the country and building of main dams and power stations to make effective use of rivers and streams, including the Jangjin and Hochon rivers and Karim Stream.
					
					 Four power stations will be built along the main waterway, while others produce electricity by harnessing waterfalls drawn from medium and small rivers.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his report made at the historic Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea set forth the task to build the large-scale Tanchon Power Station as soon as possible, and indicated the ways of completing the project on several occasions.

articles.title: Songnam Youth Coal Mine
articles.content:
Songnam Youth Coal Mine
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- It has been 60 years since the opening of the Songnam Youth Coal Mine, the first coal mine which was named after youth in the DPRK.
					 The coal mine, opened in July Juche 46 (1957), has developed into one of leading coal producers in the country under the deep care of the peerlessly great men.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, who had always paid deep attention to the youth work in his lifetime, saw to it that young people played a vanguard role in the development of coal mines, a main thrust in implementing the first five-year plan.
					
					 He put forward the task and ways to increase the coal production on several occasions, including the conference of activists in the coal-mining industry in the northern zone held in May 1957. And he initiated the development of the Songnam Youth Coal Mine and entrusted the project to the young people.
					
					 True to his intention, more than 400 young people recommended by youth league organizations in different parts of the country gathered at the Moranbong Theatre in Pyongyang in June that year to vow to carry out the project and an advance party left for Songnam.
					
					 After getting down to the project from July, they finished laying power-line and building over 100 dwelling houses and hostels in a short span of time.
					
					 They installed a compressor after cutting a way through a thick forest and started tunneling a large electric-car pit in earnest. And they conducted a high-speed tunneling campaign and thus opened up the Songnam Youth Coal Mine, one of biggest coal mines in the country, in less than one year.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il also put his heart and soul into strengthening the coal mine. He took measures to dispatch discharged soldiers to it and personally named a larch forest, created by its employees, "Songnam-style Forest for Prop Production".
					
					 Now, its coal miners are striving to greet the Conference of Mallima Frontrunners with more shining labor successes in sky-high spirit after carrying out the first half-yearly quotas ahead of schedule this year under the deep care of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Reckless Remarks of U.S. Strategic Force Commander Assailed
articles.content:
Reckless Remarks of U.S. Strategic Force Commander Assailed
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the commander of the U.S. Strategic Force said that peace was their job and the U.S. possessed nukes to prevent a world war.
					 This is nothing but deceptive farce to cover up the U.S. nuclear threats and blackmails to other countries and nuclear buildup with the veil of peace, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which has disturbed peace since its foundation on the sea of skeletons of Amerindians. The Korean War, the Vietnamese War, military invasions of Granada and Panama, the Gulf War, the Balkan War and all others were committed by the U.S. to wreck peace.
					
					 It is also due to the U.S. that vicious cycle of civil wars, terrorism and retaliations now continues in Afghanistan, Iraq, Libya and Syria.
					
					 The job of the U.S. is not peace but war.
					
					 The U.S. was the only country which imposed a nuclear disaster upon humankind in the world. When the Japanese imperialists were at the door of defeat, the U.S. dropped nuclear bombs over Nagasaki and Hiroshima. The purpose was not to force Japan to surrender but to curb the growing socialist camp and realize the ambition for world domination.
					
					 The U.S. scenario for the Korean War in the 1950s contained military invasion of the Far East of the Soviet Union and China. Humankind would have been embroiled in a new world war if the army and people of the DPRK had not given a defeat and disgrace to the U.S. imperialists in the Korean War called confrontation between rifle and A-bomb.
					
					 The U.S. is, indeed, the shameless aggressor state, war state and the culprit disturbing peace as it leaves no means untried to achieve its sinister purpose.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Brands Hong Yong Phyo as Psychopath
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Brands Hong Yong Phyo as Psychopath
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Days ago, traitor Hong Yong Phyo of south Korea leaving his office said that he had made every possible effort to lay "foundation for peace and unification" during his term. And he slandered the DPRK's step to bolster up the nuclear deterrence for self-defence, saying "it insists on nuclear development."
					 This is shameless remarks that could be made by a psychopath only, Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in a commentary, adding:
					
					 With no rhetoric and gimmick, Hong can cover up his wicked nature of traitor who ran amuck in the moves to stifle the compatriots and "unify social systems", going against national reconciliation and unity and improvement of the north-south relations.
					
					 He stressed the need to "further fasten the north" and "continue putting pressure and sanctions on it". Herein lies the wicked intention to bar the present south Korean authorities from improving the north-south relations.
					
					 Severe punishment of people should be meted out to the despicable psychopath claiming confrontation with the compatriots till the last moments of his life.

articles.title: Minju Joson Discloses Crimes of S. Korean Conservative Academics
articles.content:
Minju Joson Discloses Crimes of S. Korean Conservative Academics
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson Thursday in a commentary discloses the crimes of conservative academics of south Korea which backed the traitorous politics of the conservative regime.
					 The commentary says:
					
					 These days the conservative academics in south Korea is facing a crisis of collapse. This is the stern punishment brought by the public to the pseudo academics, a group of hack writers who did evil things only, depending on the power.
					
					 They are a group of human scum who abused the noble learning for their despicable purpose.
					
					 They, devoid of conscience and dignity for power and money, had actively protected the traitorous politics of top-class traitors Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye "academically".
					
					 In collusion with the conservative regimes, they justified the colonial rule by outside forces, spreading poisoning idea of sycophancy and pro-U.S. servility, and paralyze the independent consciousness of people. They are servants of the power as they actively backed the unpopular policy of the conservative regimes treating the working masses as dogs or pigs through absurd sophism and false rumors.
					
					 It is also those conservative academics that fully supported the conservative regimes' heinous policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 They are now dreaming of "revival" and "reinstatement", talking about "solution and reconstruction" to save their poor fate in the grip of crisis. However it is no more than last-ditch effort of those more dead than alive.

articles.title: Chairmen of Trade Unions of S. Korea Vow to Realize Hike of Workers' Minimum Wages
articles.content:
Chairmen of Trade Unions of S. Korea Vow to Realize Hike of Workers' Minimum Wages
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The acting chairman of the Confederation of Trade Unions and the chairman of the Federation of Trade Unions of south Korea held a joint press conference at the Kwanghwamun Plaza in Seoul on July 11 vowing to realize the hike of workers' minimum wages, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 They said that they would carry on steady struggle without concession to realize the hike of the workers' minimum wages.
					
					 The hike of their minimum wages should not be a precondition of their victims, they said, calling for holding negotiations by the standard desired by the people.

articles.title: Chongryon Youth Officials Support S. Koreans' No-THAAD Actions
articles.content:
Chongryon Youth Officials Support S. Koreans' No-THAAD Actions
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Officials of youth organizations of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) made public statements on July 10 in support of the fierce struggle of south Korean people including youth and students against the U.S. moves for THAAD deployment.
					 Pae Jun Ryol, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, in a statement said the U.S. THAAD deployment was dangerous one to threaten peace and security of the Korean peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia and ignite a nuclear war.
					
					However, the south Korean chief executive yielded to the U.S. asserting that THAAD deployment was the "agreement" based on the "south Korea-U.S. alliance." The statement termed his behavior a suicidal act of driving the situation on the Korean peninsula into the worst phase. 
					
					 Korean youth and students in Japan will oppose aggression moves of the outside forces and wage a dynamic struggle for hastening reunification of the country in solidarity with the youth in the north, the south and overseas, he stated.
					
					 Kim Hyon Il, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Students in Japan, fully supported the south Korean youth and students declaring that the struggle is the action against the U.S. colonial rule and the corrupt pro-U.S. conservative forces beyond the struggle against THAAD.

articles.title: Int'l Body Pays Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Int'l Body Pays Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America on July 6 held an event to place a floral basket at the portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of his demise.
					 Present at the event were the secretary general and members of the organization and the DPRK ambassador to Cuba and his embassy officials.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket at the portrait and paid tribute to the President.
					
					 The secretary general mentioned the feats of the President for the freedom and independence of the country and happiness of its people and the development of the friendly ties between the Korean people and the world people.
					
					 He said:
					
					 It is very just for the DPRK to further bolster up its nuclear deterrence to cope with the U.S. escalating hostile moves against the DPRK.
					
					 The Korean people are a model to be followed by the world people in the anti-imperialist and anti-U.S. struggle.
					
					 The Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America fully supports the struggle of the Korean people to defend the sovereignty and dignity of their country and will continue to conduct vigorous activities of solidarity with them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries to celebrate the first anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					 Celebration meetings, lecture meetings, book and photo exhibitions and film shows were held in Nepal, Bangladesh, Iceland, Spain, Benin and Nigeria between June 21 and 30.
					
					 The chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association said that thanks to Kim Jong Un the global peace and security have been reliably guaranteed and startling miracles and innovations are being wrought one after another in the DPRK.
					
					 The chairman of a branch of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea said that Kim Jong Un is steadfastly leading the army and people to the road of independence, Songun and socialism, meeting the vicious challenge of the imperialist allied forces.
					
					 The chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said that the progressive humankind's reverence for Kim Jong Un is growing deeper with each passing day.
					
					 The speakers at an event in Nigeria stressed that Kim Jong Un is the most prominent person in the world as he has defended and added luster to the dignity and sovereignty of the country and nation, meeting every challenge of the imperialists without vacillation.

articles.title: World Media Praise Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
World Media Praise Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Media of various countries and regions carried special write-ups between June 25 and 29 to mark the first anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					 Russia's newspaper Tomskaya Nedeli carried an article titled "Comrade Kim Jong Un recognized by the world" illustrated with his photo.
					
					 The paper dealt with what foreign press has told about the fact that he is carrying forward the idea and cause of the great leaders thoroughly.
					
					 Russia's online magazine Lemchich carried an article titled "Leader Kim Jong Un and children" illustrated with his photos, telling about his outlook on posterity. He is devoting his all to cultivating the future of the country, it said.
					
					 The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted on its website an article titled "To build an invincible military power" illustrated with his photo. The article praised him for making a ceaseless journey of Songun leadership to bolster up the military capability of the country.
					
					 The Nigerian paper Nigerian Observer in an article said that he is the symbol of mightiness and the peerlessly great man as he does not know the impossibility and goes ever-victorious.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo, the Novosibirsk Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and the African Regional Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People headquartered in Nigeria posted on their websites articles praising his personality as a great man.

articles.title: British Bodies Support Just Struggle of Korean People
articles.content:
British Bodies Support Just Struggle of Korean People
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Korean Friendship Association UK and the British Solidarity Committee for Peace and Reunification of the Korean Peninsula made public a joint statement on June 15 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We extend firm support and solidarity to the just struggle of the Korean people on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					
					 Many years has passed since the U.S. imperialists ignited the Korean War, but the Korean people and other progressives in the world remember the criminal atrocities of the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 On June 25, 1950, the U.S. imperialists abetted the south Korean puppet warmongers to launch an armed invasion of the young DPRK.
					
					 The hair-raising atrocities committed by the U.S. imperialists during the war have sparked strong denunciation from the international community.
					
					 However, the U.S. is still watching for a chance to ignite another war, turning deaf ear to the voice of the Korean people and other world progressives.
					
					 The U.S. resorting to persistent sanctions and pressure against the DPRK is a violation of independence of a sovereign state.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Switzerland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Switzerland
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea brought out in booklet Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Concluding Speech at the March 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea" to mark the first anniversary of his election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					 In the work published on March 31, Juche 102 (2013), he said that the plenary meeting of the C.C., WPK served as a new historic landmark in defending and glorifying the feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il to build a nuclear power and in hastening the building of a socialist power.
					
					 The work deals with the important matters arising in implementing the strategic line of the Party on simultaneously pushing ahead with the economic construction and the building of a nuclear force.
					
					 The book releasing ceremony took place in Basel on July 5.

articles.title: Brisk Introduction of Works of Great Leaders of DPRK Called for in Switzerland
articles.content:
Brisk Introduction of Works of Great Leaders of DPRK Called for in Switzerland
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- We will intensify the work to widely introduce the works of the great leaders of the DPRK.
					 Martin Lotscher, chief of the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, declared this at a ceremony of releasing respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Concluding Speech at the March 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea" on July 5.
					
					 He said:
					
					 After setting forth the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts at the March 2013 Plenary Meeting of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Jong Un has wisely led the struggle to implement the line.
					
					 On July 4 the DPRK succeeded in the test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-14 at one go.
					
					 It is a great success made in implementing the WPK's line on simultaneously developing the two fronts.
					
					 The Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea warmly congratulates the great auspicious event to be specially recorded in the history of Songun Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se retrata con contribuidores al lanzamiento de prueba de "Hwasong-14"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se retrata con contribuidores al lanzamiento de prueba de "Hwasong-14"
Pyongyang, 13 de julio (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un se retrato con el personal que hizo aporte al exitoso lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico intercontinental "Hwasong-14".
					 Cuando el llego al lugar de filmacion, todos los participantes le acogieron con hospitalidad.
					
					 El volvio a evaluar el merito heroico de los cientificos, tecnicos, obreros y funcionarios del sector de defensa nacional que demostraron a todo el mundo la dignidad independiente de la Corea del Juche y el temperamento indoblegable de su pueblo firme y valiente y defendieron a ultranza el absoluto prestigio del PTC.
					
					  Tomo la foto de recuerdo expresando la esperanza y conviccion de que ellos cumpliran perfectamente su honrosa mision de abanderados y vanguardias No. 1, que cumplen al frente el proyecto estrategico del partido de convertir el pais en una potencia nuclear, al desarrollar y completar en el nivel mas alto y con mas rapidez el mayor numero de armas estrategicas y cohetes Juche mas potentes. 
					
					  En la filmacion estuvieron presentes Ri Man Gon y Ri Pyong Chol.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un participa en premiacion a contribuidores al lanzamiento de prueba de "Hwasong-14"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un participa en premiacion a contribuidores al lanzamiento de prueba de "Hwasong-14"
Pyongyang, 13 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar con solemnidad en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae la ceremonia de condecoracion del partido y el Estado al personal que hizo aporte al exitoso lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico intercontinental.
					 Cuando el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un salio a la sede de premiacion, todos los participantes explotaron los vitores de "!Viva!"
					
					  El felicito respondio cordialmente a los cientificos de defensa nacional que apoyaron con el exito orgulloso la causa del partido sobre la construccion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Juche.
					
					  En su discurso de la ocasion, dijo que preparo este encuentro significativo para entronizar y presentar a todo el mundo a los cientificos, tecnicos, obreros y funcionarios del sector de defensa nacional quienes dieron a luz el sistema de armamento estrategico ideado por el partido en el plazo fijado por este.
					
					  Analizo el significado del reciente exito del lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico intercontinental que cambio radicalmente la posicion estrategica de la RPDC y la estructura de politica mundial y agrego que esto comprobo que es mil veces justa la linea del partido de impulsar simultaneamente la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					  Presento las tareas que se corresponden al colectivo de investigacion de cohetes.
					
					  Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los cientificos, tecnicos, obreros y funcionarios del sector lograran exitos mas relevantes en la sagrada lucha por preparar la mejor garantia militar bajo la consigna "!A la batalla de vida o muerte por la patria y el pueblo!".
					
					  Kim Jong Un otorgo a los que hicieron aporte al exitoso lanzamiento las Ordenes Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, maximas condecoraciones de la RPDC, el titulo de Heroe de la RPDC, maximo honor del ciudadano, la Medalla Estrella de Oro y la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase, el titulo de Heroe del Trabajo, la Medalla Estrella de Oro (el Martillo y la Hoz) y la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase, el Premio Kim Jong Il, los relojes con los nombres inscritos del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el diploma de honor del Presidente del PTC Kim Jong Un, el diploma de honor del Comandante Supremo del EPC Kim Jong Un, el Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Cancilleria coreana califica a EE.UU. de caudillo de violacion de DDHH
articles.content:
Cancilleria coreana califica a EE.UU. de caudillo de violacion de DDHH
Pyongyang, 13 de julio (ACNC) -- A la pregunta formulada por el reportero de la ACNC con respecto a que EE.UU. se halla en un aprieto por sus actos arrogantes portandose como "juez de DDHH", el vocero del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio la siguiente respuesta:
					Esta conocido por todo el mundo el hecho de que EE.UU. es el caudillo de violacion de DDHH y pais original de trafico de humano.
					
					En ese pais americano mas de 67 mil mujeres sufren diariamente la violacion sexual y mas de 100 mil ninas estan obligadas cada ano a la prostitucion.
					
					Tambien, se incrementa bruscamente el trafico de ninos, lo cual no pasa de ser una parte del estado de violacion de DDHH en EE.UU.
					
					Tambien, ese pais americano es el unico pais que niega su ingreso en los convenios internacionales por la prevencion del trafico humano incluyendo el convenio por la prohibicion de trafico humano y la prostitucion y el convenio de derechos de ninos en los que estan participados casi todos los paises del mundo.
					
					Recientemente, los dos relatores especiales por temas pertenecientes al Consejo de DDHH de la ONU demandaron la cancelacion de la sentencia de pena capital presentando una duda del proceso de juicio sobre los discapacitados mentales efectuado en EE.UU., lo cual refleja la censura y el odio de la arena internacional sobre el sistema judicial del pais norteamericano que perpetra la violacion a los derechos humanos.
					
					Resulta muy absurdo el que EE.UU. censura a otros paises inventando anualmente el "informe de trafico de humano".
					
					Hace poco, el Departamento de Estado norteamericano hizo publico el "informe de trafico de humano" de 2017 y cuestiono arbitrariamente la situacion de DDHH de otros paises. Esto provoco la condena de muchos paises que lo calificaron unanimemente de un documento falso lleno de fraudes y calificaron a EE.UU. del nido de trafico de humano.
					
					En particular, Rusia rechazo como un documento fraude el "informe" de EE.UU. de que los trabajadores norcoreanos estan sometidos en el "trabajo forzoso" en los "asentamientos de trabajo" en el territorio ruso. La realidad vuelve a demostrar que el pais norteamericano es caudillo de fraudes y mentiras.
					
					Antes que todo, EE.UU debera aprender primero el modo de corregir primeramente los quehaceres asquerosos propios de su pais, violador y criminal de DDHH quitando de inmediato la mascara de "juez de DDHH".

articles.title: Portavoz de Jonminthukwi apoya la lucha antiyanqui de poblacion surcoreana
articles.content:
Portavoz de Jonminthukwi apoya la lucha antiyanqui de poblacion surcoreana
Pyongyang, 13 de julio (ACNC) -- En relacion con que se torna intensa en el Sur de Corea la lucha antiyanqui de los habitantes surcoreanos de diferentes sectores con motivo del aniversario 51 de la fabricacion del "Acuerdo Administrativo" Sur de Corea-EE.UU., el portavoz de la Direccion Nortena de Jonminthukwi (Comite Pannacional de Averiguacion Especial para Esclarecer Verdaderos Aspectos de Crimenes de Tropas Norteamericanas) hizo publica el dia 13 una declaracion que sigue:
					Las entidades civiles y los habitantes surcoreanos de diversos sectores endurecen por doquier la lucha antiyanqui para descargar el rencor acumulado contra los agresores norteamericanos que durante mas de 50 anos, cometieron el asesinato, el saqueo y otros crimenes de toda indole en el suelo surcoreano tomando el "Acuerdo Administrativo" Sur de Corea-EE.UU. como escudo legal.
					
					Es una verguenza de la nacion que existiera en la actual epoca de independencia ese pacto vendepatria que exige tratar a las tropas agresoras extranjeras como ente intocable.
					
					Ya que la traidora proyanqui Park Geun-hye fue destituida segun la voluntad del pueblo, se le presenta ahora al pueblo surcoreano como prioridad impostergable la cancelacion de ese acuerdo leonino. 
					
					Sin embargo, al igual que los "poderes" antecesores, las actuales autoridades surcoreanas persiguen el estacionamiento perpetuo de las tropas norteamericanas en territorio surcoreano abogando por la "consolidacion de alianza".
					
					Ellas deben tener presente que si buscan la salvacion en la confrontacion fratricida entronizando como Redentor a los uniformados yanquis, autores de la division nacional y fuente de todas las desgracias y sufrimientos, no podran evitar el fin tragico como la traidora Park Geun-hye, ramera proyanqui de peor calana.
